articles.content: MI vs RCB IPL 2024: Rohit Sharma, by now, has championed his stump mic game. On April 11, as Mumbai Indians (MI) bowlers were getting hammered by Dinesh Karthik, the hitman teased the Royal Challenge… [+2040 chars]
